original_title: Asia: Spirit Of The Night - The Phoenix Tour Live In Cambridge 2009
overview: Active again since 2006, The Original Asia of Geoff Downes, John Wetton, Steve Howe and Carl Palmer have been keeping as busy as possible for their fans by releasing both live and studio material along with full concert DVD's that pay proper attention to the tour they come from.
title: Asia: Spirit Of The Night - The Phoenix Tour Live In Cambridge 2009
